# 臺大行政大樓單位索引Administration Building - List of Offices

Main Content
行政大樓  Administration Building
行政大樓位於椰林大道上 、前方廣場是傅鐘和方形噴水池。 行政大樓是棟磚紅色的二層樓建築，正面入口 4 支古典的科林式柱是它的重要代表景觀。
The Administration Building (M50) sits on the Palm Boulevard behind the Fu Bell and water fountain. Layered with vibrant red bricks and adorned with classic Corinthian order columns, this Japanese-style building is representative of the University's historic past.

# 臺大行政大樓單位索引Administration Building - List of Offices

Main Content
敬賢樓  Jinxian Hall
敬賢樓（舊稱第二行政大樓）為五層樓的磚紅色建築，在行政大樓的西側、有走廊相互連結。 本棟建物的西側是農化新館。
The Jinxian Hall (M43, originally named "the 2nd Administration Building") is located west to the Administration Building with a hallway connecting the two. The five-strory building can be noted by its vibrant red tilings. The west end of the building is used as the New Agricultural Chemistry Building.

# 臺大行政大樓單位索引Admi nistration Building - List of Offices

Main Content
禮賢樓 LIxian Hall
禮賢樓是一棟8層樓的建築物，位於欒樹道、管理學院旁，自行政大樓步行至禮賢樓，大約需要5分鐘。禮賢樓是為了改善行政辦公空間不足的問題、並取代鹿鳴堂的展演、生活服務機能，而興建樓建物。地下1樓是展演空間，一、二樓是商場和餐廳，三樓是會議室，四樓到八樓是辦公室。2020年10月起各行政單位陸續進駐啟用。
The Lixian Hall is an eight-strory building , located on Golden Rain Avenue, next to the College of Management. It takes about 5 minutes to walk from the Administration Building to here. The Lixian Hall is a multi-purpose building to improve administrative office space and replace the service functions of the Lu-ming Hall.
Basement : Event, display and performance area
1F~2F : Stores, bank, food courts
3F : Meeting Rooms
4F~8F : Administrative Offices

# 臺大行政大樓單位索引Administration Building - List of Offices

Main Content
行政大樓周邊辦公室  Other Offices around the Administration Building
有些行政單位的辦公室，分散於行政大樓周邊的小房子中，這些房子不一定有名字，因此暫時以英文字母代號來稱呼。查看下方清單可以進一步了解建築的介紹和使用單位 ~
Other offices not located within the two major Administration Buildings are listed here.Check the following   letters (A~E) for the complete list..
事務組雜工班
Office of Maintenance Workers
位於農化新館西側、女五舍入口旁的一層樓灰色平房。
The one-floor grey bungalow is located at west of the New Agricultural Building and in front of the 5th Women's Dormitory.
地圖 MAP
校園景觀 Campus View
保管組倉庫
The warehouse of Property Management Division
位於綠色小屋後方的一層樓灰色平房，是學生辧理借用學位服的辦公室。
The one-floor grey bungalow is behind the green log cabin shop. NTU students can rent graduation gowns in this office.
地圖 MAP
校園景觀 Campus View
行政大樓西側的一層樓平房
This single-story building west of the Administration Buildng
大煙囪是這棟房子最明顯的標誌。
The big smokestack is its most obvious landmark.

3 層樓的望樂樓，入口處的外牆上有可愛的彩繪，中間有片綠意盎然的小小庭園「未央庭」。
The three-strory Hall of Joy and Hope (M46) can be best spotted by the vibrant walls surrounding its lovely courtyard named "Way Young Courtyard".
